Class MobileConnectConfig

java.lang.Object
  com.gsma.mobileconnect.r2.MobileConnectConfig
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPreferences
public class MobileConnectConfig
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPreferences

Configuration properties for the MobileConnectInterface, reused across all requests for a single MobileConnectInterface or MobileConnectWebInterface.

Since:
2.0
See Also:
MobileConnectInterface, MobileConnectWebInterface
